english.segment1: It was a good night I stayed on key. Me and the drummer were on the same beat. Had coordination in both my feet. Oh what a night!
english.segment2: I took off my guitar and i met you. sweet little angel beneath the moon. The stars were shining and so were you. Then i saw the light
english.segment3: So i took your fingers to my face. And with the tips began to trace. The way that my eyes and my mouth were shaped. And you had your sight. for a moment that night
english.segment4: Chorus: Bye Bye Brianna. Bye Bye Brianna. Bye Bye Brianna. What a delight
english.segment5: Bye Bye Brianna. Bye Bye Brianna. Bye Bye Brianna. I see you in the daylight
english.segment6: You're only seven and you taught me. Life is much more than what we see. Behind the veil of history. Til faith becomes sight. (believing is seeing)
english.segment7: Cause there's so much beauty to behold. A world of wonder to unfold. Safe with a pure in the heart and soul. Who turn on the light. In the dark of the night
english.segment9: I talked to your mother the other day. And she told me you passed away. I couldnt find the words to say. I started to cry
english.segment10: She said when the heart begins to ache. She can remember you in a place. Looking at Jesus face to face. Oh what a delight you got to sight. His hands in the light. You can see me tonight
english.segment11: Bye Bye Brianna. Bye Bye Brianna. Bye Bye Brianna. Yeah!!!
english.segment12: Bye Bye Brianna. Bye Bye Brianna. Bye Bye Brianna. Yeah!!!
english.segment13: You can see me tonight. You can see me tonight. You can see me tongiht. Yeah!!!
english.segment14: See it was a good night. Sure was a good night. It was a good night. Yeah!!!
english.segment15: Bye Bye Brianna. Bye Bye Brianna. Bye Bye Brianna. Yeah!!!
english.segment16: I see you in the daylight. I see you in the daylight. I see you in the daylight. Yeah!. (repeat 2X)
english.segment17: Nanny. Papa. Sister goddy. Aunt vie. Uncle jackson. Uncle davis. Brianna
